channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: The Upload VR Showcase - Winter 2023
item.description: Get The Break-In, AMID EVIL VR, Cooking Simulator VR and more!
item.content:encoded:
Don your headset and dive into some of the best VR games out there, in celebration of the UploadVR Showcase Winter 2023! This bundle is brimming with mind-blowing VR experiences across genres and themes, showcasing the medium in all its awe-inspiring variety:

  • Navigate a scorching zombie-infested hellscape with heart-pounding thrills in Arizona Sunshine Deluxe Edition--packed with DLC and other bonus content!
  • Experience the thrill of the heist in the cooperative VR caper The Break-In.
  • Whip up culinary masterpieces step-by-step in the virtual kitchen of Cooking Simulator VR;.
  • Plus five other games in this bundle of VR delights, all in support of buildOn.

item.title: Uplifting Adventures: A Wholesome Games Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Let the feelings of comfort, compassion, and coziness wash over you with this bundle of stirring experiences, curated by our friends at Wholesome Games!

In the adorable 3D platformer Tinykin, you’ll explore a 90’s era house from the perspective of a shrunken extraterrestrial scientist, with the help of some multi-talented critters.
Wylde Flowers takes you on a witchy pastoral journey where you’ll farm by day, and weave magic by night.
The aptly titled Bear and Breakfast is a laid-back management sim where you help the adorable ursine Hank run a successful B&B in the woods.

Fill your heart with these and four other soulful and wholesome games, and help support Save the Children with your purchase!

item.title: Fight T1D With JRPGs!
item.description: Join the fight against type 1 diabetes
item.content:encoded:
Help battle against type 1 diabetes (T1D) with this bundle of games for JRPG lovers! Bring peace to the land of Tahnra in Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga. Uncover the secrets of the Land of Bugaria in Bug Fables: The Everlasting Sapling. Journey through the neo-futuristic metropolis of Mato Anomalies.

Get these and more games influenced by your favorite timeless JRPG sagas—and help JDRF on their mission to use the power of research, advocacy, and community engagement to advance life-changing breakthroughs for the millions of people living with T1D.

item.title: Black Friday Score: The Walking Dead & More from Skybound
item.description: The Walking Dead, WrestleQuest, and more
item.content:encoded: Zombie scares, epic wrestling adventures, and lots more await in this Black Friday bundle featuring Skybound Games! Delve deep into the world of The Walking Dead with the complete story of Telltale’s acclaimed narrative adventure series, and immerse yourself in the VR horror of Saints & Sinners, including the latest Chapter 2: Retribution. Tag team with destiny in WrestleQuest, where pro wrestling and RPGs collide. Get Glitch Busters, Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood, and more—and help support a charity of your choice with your purchase.
